item.description:
New Rules - a New Game - for The New Year!

Let's pit our personal perspectives on the value of items that we've found difficult to release against the competing perspectives on those same items held by others within our group (some of whom are professional organizers) who have NO issues with releasing those same items! Perhaps their rules will serve us better in this new year than our present ones have until now...?

It's Time for a Change!!  Let's get to it!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll put a Meetup tent sign on the front door and at our table upstairs (at least until the formal meeting begins)

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: NEW RULES to Serve Us Better in 2013: Dueling Perspectives
